parameters.query: =SELECT id, tenant_id, client_final_id, numero_proforma, date_proforma, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, description, mode_paiement FROM proformas WHERE id = {{ $json.proformaId }} AND tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenantId }}' AND statut = 'acceptee'
=SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(numero_facture, 5) AS INTEGER)), 0) + 1 as next_num FROM factures WHERE numero_facture LIKE 'FAC-' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY') || '-%'

=INSERT INTO factures (tenant_id, client_final_id, numero_facture, date_facture, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, description, mode_paiement, statut, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ('{{ $json.tenantId }}', '{{ $json.devis.client_final_id }}', '{{ $json.numeroFacture }}', NOW()::date, {{ $json.devis.montant_ht }}, {{ $json.devis.montant_ttc }}, {{ $json.devis.tva_taux }}, '{{ $json.devis.description }}', '{{ $json.devis.mode_paiement }}', 'brouillon', NOW(), NOW()) RETURNING id
=SELECT id, ligne_numero, description, quantite, prix_unitaire, montant_ht, tva_taux, montant_ttc FROM proforma_lines WHERE proforma_id = {{ $json.proformaId }}
